author: cms-met
body:
Contains the fixed content of #17720 (similar to #17524) merged on top of #17801.

This PR ports the last MET changes developed in 80X, including the muon removal tools developed for Moriond 2017.

Additions :
- bad muon removal code for MET
- EGamma tools for MET
- 2016 legacy MET filters (remastered in the same way as in #17968 )



Limited matrix tests successful, and the use of the command 
cmsDriver.py step4  --conditions auto:run2_data_relval -s PAT,DQM:@miniAODDQM \
--runUnscheduled  --process PAT --data  --era Run2_2016 --eventcontent MINIAOD,DQM\
 --hltProcess reHLT --scenario pp --datatier MINIAOD,DQM \
--customise_unsch PhysicsTools/PatAlgos/slimming/customizeMiniAOD_MuEGFixMoriond2017.customizeAll\
 -n -1 --filein file:step3.root  --fileout file:step4.root --no_exec

with the step3.root file from 136.761 works as well.

This PR replaces #17720
title: Port of the last 80X/90X MET (#16174 #17524) changes in 91X
